p: The COVID‐19 pandemic has been a significant stressor on the world. At the time of writing, the virus has been attributed to over 5.7 million deaths globally (Worldometers website, 2022). In the early days of the pandemic, nations applied “lockdowns” to reduce the spread of the virus. Studies have shown that these lockdowns impacted ecosystems and societal activity around the world (Atalan, 2020; Verma & Prakash, 2021).
